item.title: A Shorter Domain Name
item.description: This year, I decided not to renewal the previous domain name (hailiang.ws) last year, but to register a shorter one. There are two reasons: Both the site URL and the email address will be cleaner. A more friendly Go import path will be possible for my repositories on Github. After comparing various choices on major domain providers, I chose h12.io as the new domain. It is the shortest but still meaningful domain that I can afford.
